alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Cherokee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:25PM CDT until June 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cherokee County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Buena Vista County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Larrabee, or near Cherokee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Linn Grove around 950 PM CDT. Truesdale around 955 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Meriden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
